AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: physicist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a respected scientist on the Fendran homeworld. Although [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in their studies, [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't able to focus on much else in [PAWN_possessive] life.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: research director
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a renowned research director on the Fendran homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] was the paragon of [PAWN_possessive] field, working long days and nights and leading [PAWN_possessive] team in the pursuit of science.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: influencer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a medium-scale influencer who captivated young Fendran minds with clickbait titles and copy-paste reactions. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to manipulate others and is used to being better than everyone around [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: test subject
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Someone had to be the one to test new drugs. [PAWN_nameDef] was paid for [PAWN_possessive] time — and body — to be given doses of new formulas and then report the effects. [PAWN_pronoun] learned a lot about the drugs that [PAWN_pronoun] took, and got good at making comfort food to help [PAWN_objective] feel better afterward.\n\nRemarkably, [PAWN_pronoun] hasn't suffered any serious side effects, though the ordeal has left a permanent taste for drugs in [PAWN_possessive] mouth.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: politician
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a politicial within [PAWN_possessive] local government. [PAWN_pronoun] was respected for much of [PAWN_possessive] career, but a vicious scandal forced [PAWN_objective] to abdicate and move away.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef]'s secretary did almost all of the banal work for [PAWN_objective] while in office.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: enforcer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an enforcer, put in charge of keeping the peace on the Fendran homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] was given plenty of autonomy within [PAWN_possessive] beat and built up a friendly reputation.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: elite enforcer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an enforcer, put in charge of keeping the peace on the Fendran homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] worked in a very rough part of [PAWN_possessive] city, and spent much of [PAWN_possessive] time fighting criminals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: nurse
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a busy hospital on the Fendran homeworld, doing routine work such as changing bandages and taking temperatures.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: whitepaw
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a whitepaw — a monicker for a Fendran doctor — in a busy hospital on the Fendran homeworld. Shifts were long and grueling, but [PAWN_pronoun] didn't mind.\n\nAfter years of work, [PAWN_nameDef] has seen enough of the consequences of violence for a lifetime.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: skymedic
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a skymedic, responding rapidly to medical emergencies via rapid insertion in a hovercraft. [PAWN_pronoun] is used to working with limited supplies and especially time.\n\nOccasionally, [PAWN_nameDef] had to restrain disoriented and unruly patients while stabilizing them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: construction engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a construction engineer on the Fendran homeworld, coordinating with [PAWN_possessive] team using state-of-the-art equipment to build everything from massive hydroponics laboratories to modular housing. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to value the effectiveness of a tight-knit team.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hydroponics specialist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a massive hydroponics lab, growing specialized strains of crops to feed entire cities. [PAWN_pronoun] was never seen not wearing [PAWN_possessive] labcoat.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: microasteroid miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] piloted a cramped driller that cracked small asteroids open from the inside out to harvest the ores within. The dangerous nature of [PAWN_possessive] work gave [PAWN_objective] plenty of experience making on-the-fly repairs.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: game designer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on a small team making video games. [PAWN_pronoun] had a close bond with [PAWN_possessive] team, as well as the food delivery app on [PAWN_possessive] phone.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ranger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped maintain a large nature reserve. [PAWN_pronoun] became adept at herding the animals, and occasionally culling one or two and selling the meat under the table.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: drifter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't able to hold down any job for very long. [PAWN_pronoun] floated between professions, picking up a myriad of skills but not committing to any of them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: arcclaw
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Arcclaws — so-called after an ancient story described one with electricity arcing between his claws — are a respected profession of inventors that help advance Fendran research with novel contributions. [PAWN_nameDef] was one such person, and made several minor advancements in [PAWN_possessive] field.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: roboticist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a robotics lab, developing (but not installing) cutting-edge prosthetics and bionic limbs for other Fendra. Occasionally, [PAWN_pronoun] would be asked to develop mechanized combat suits, giving [PAWN_objective] limited insight into military equipment.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: career criminal
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Even in Fendran society, organized crime has a strong foothold. [PAWN_nameDef] was a lieutenant in a notable mafia, following the boss' orders to the letter. [PAWN_pronoun] especially liked having subordinates to boss around, but knew not to get attached to anyone, ever.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: convict
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] denies involvement in the crime that saw [PAWN_objective] spend many years in prison. The Fendran reform programs didn't quite cut it for [PAWN_objective], and one fateful day, [PAWN_pronoun] hijacked a delivery shuttle and flew off into the cosmos.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: pirate outlaw
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Fendran society is no exception to the plague of piracy. [PAWN_nameDef] managed to avoid numerous close calls with the law while extorting and ravaging passing spaceships.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] didn't know what to do with [PAWN_possessive] life, and decided to enlist in the Fendran military. [PAWN_pronoun] learned a variety of basic skills, but didn't see any combat.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lieutenant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a lieutenant in the Fendran military, and often fought alongside [PAWN_possessive] platoon at the front lines. [PAWN_pronoun] had a sharp mind for battle and became known for winning many skirmishes.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: deserter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a combat medic in the Fendran military. After a skirmish went awry and [PAWN_pronoun] saw [PAWN_possessive] best friend blow up in front of [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_pronoun] deserted the military and was never seen on the Fendran homeworld again.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: steelbender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a high-tech smithy, bending hard steel and other materials to [PAWN_possessive] will. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a knack for including personal motifs in [PAWN_possessive] work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wilderness explorer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Even on the Fendran homeworld, there were still wildernesses to conquer. [PAWN_nameDef] helped chart maps and guide researchers through the dangerous wilds.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] got good at creating improvised shelter and tools far away from home.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: baker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a baker in an urban city on the Fendran homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] would wake up before sunrise each morning to prepare [PAWN_possessive] goods and still sell out by sunset.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] spent much of [PAWN_possessive] free time fixing up and improving [PAWN_possessive] bakery.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cargowing controller
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] controlled a fleet of cargowings — long-range, spaceborne hauler drones. [PAWN_possessive] job was little more than connecting dots between available drones and pending deliveries and ensuring they arrived on time. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] breaks building and painting a small model of the drones that [PAWN_pronoun] saw every day.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: excavator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Whenever uneven terrain needed to be flattened for a construction project, [PAWN_nameDef]'s team was called in.Moving tons upon tons of soil was a boring job, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned to embrace the monotony.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: office worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of hundreds of office workers in a corporate highrise. [PAWN_possessive]'s job consisted of data entry, countless meetings, and being mismanaged by superiors.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: soothpaw
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Soothpaws offer counseling services for Fendra in need. [PAWN_nameDef] let others lean on [PAWN_possessive] shoulder countless times, offering what advice [PAWN_pronoun] could.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: secretary
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a secretary for the local government. Endless phone calls and byzantine paperwork were the bread and butter of [PAWN_possessive]'s career.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: book-kit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was fascinated by the myriad of literature [PAWN_possessive] parents kept in the house. [PAWN_pronoun] taught himself to read at an early age.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: industrial worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a poor family and had to work for much of [PAWN_possessive] kithood. [PAWN_possessive] earliest memories were from the inner bellies of factories and workhouses.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sheltered kit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had extremely protective parents that kept [PAWN_objective] sheltered from the outside world. [PAWN_pronoun] received a thorough education and curated friends, but did very little manual labor.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: shop kit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents owned a meager shop in the city. [PAWN_pronoun] worked the front desk most of the time, learning the art of the deal. [PAWN_pronoun] took interest in some of the more ornate knick-knacks on the shelves.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: medical helper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born during a brutal civil war on the Fendran homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] helped [PAWN_possessive] parents in an infirmary, treating anything from burns to gunshots to amputations. Patients were often happy to see [PAWN_objective] and [PAWN_possessive] enduring spirit, although [PAWN_pronoun] developed a lifelong fear of war.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tinkerer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Like most kits, [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for taking things apart. Unlike most kits, [PAWN_pronoun] could also put them back together. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a hobby for tinkering with small machinery and made a small allowance selling what [PAWN_pronoun] made.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: unwanted kit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s birth was an accident, and [PAWN_possessive] parents threw [PAWN_objective] into a dumpster at a very young age. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to survive alone, relying on [PAWN_possessive] own skills rather than trusting anyone else for help.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: savant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] suffered a traumatic injury at a young age that left [PAWN_objective] mute for most of [PAWN_possessive] kithood. [PAWN_pronoun] turned out to be really good at playing the piano afterward.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: city kit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in an urban city. [PAWN_possessive] early years were spent exploring the sprawling environment around [PAWN_objective] with [PAWN_possessive] friends.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rural scout
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a very rural town on the Fendran homeworld where food was relatively scarce. [PAWN_pronoun] was remarkably light on [PAWN_possessive] feet and helped scout for animal herds for the hunters to pursue. This meant [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't able to socialize with other kits as frequently.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gamer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was swept up in the various fads and trends in the video game industry. [PAWN_pronoun] would often skip class to play new games, and found several of [PAWN_possessive] closest friends online.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: country kit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a ranch growing livestock and crops. [PAWN_pronoun] helped tend to both as [PAWN_pronoun] grew up.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hooligan
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] kithood getting into fights, first on the playground and then in the back alleys. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to hold a weapon like it was an extension of [PAWN_possessive] arm.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lonely kit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the eleventh kit in [PAWN_possessive] family. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't get much attention from [PAWN_possessive] parents and siblings, and found the family's pets to be better company anyway. [PAWN_pronoun] made many drawings of them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: pampered kit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into an influential family on the Fendran homeworld. Many of [PAWN_possessive] needs were taken care of, giving [PAWN_objective] plenty of time to learn proper decorum and pursue an education, although [PAWN_pronoun] was not in contention to inherit the family wealth.
